short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TestCraft - GPT-Powered Test Idea Generator & Automated Test Creator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing TestCraft, a free and open-source browser extension with the power GPT-4, designed to be a companion to your software testing.

Key Features:

AI-Powered Test Idea Generation: Leverage the power of GPT-4 AI to generate comprehensive test ideas based on webpage elements.

Automated Test Creation: Generate ready-to-run test scripts for popular automation frameworks, Playwright, Selenium, and Cypress, in your preferred programming language: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, C#, and Java. TestCraft eases your test creation process and saves time.

Accessibility Checks: Empower your web applications to be inclusive for all users. TestCraft identifies accessibility issues and provides actionable insights to improve.

Test Idea to Automated Tests: Seamlessly convert your AI-generated test ideas into automated test scripts. Additionally, you can edit the test ideas to improve them before generating automation tests.

Unlock the full potential of your testing process with TestCraft. Download it now and experience the future of software testing!
